name: Epic Cybop
description: Epic Cybops are the lords of laziness, the sovereigns of sloth, and the masters of the uni-... uh, the masters of immobility. This idle Epic is exhausted by the mere thought of powering a propeller, and instead favors ziplining place to place. By simply threading steel wire through the loop of its helmet, it can let its body go limp while gravity does the work.
breedingTime: Breeding Time: 23 hr, Enhanced Time: 17 hr 15 min
